adobe-cli.name: Adobe I/O CLI & SDK
adobe-cli.description: Command-line interface and SDK for Adobe I/O services

citisignal-nextjs.name: Headless CitiSignal
citisignal-nextjs.description: NextJS-based storefront with Adobe mesh integration

commerce-mesh.description: GraphQL gateway for unifying commerce data sources

experience-platform.description: Adobe Experience Platform integration via Commerce Data Sharing

MESH_ENDPOINT.label: Mesh Query URL
MESH_ENDPOINT.description: The GraphQL endpoint for your Adobe Commerce API Mesh
MESH_ENDPOINT.helpText: Automatically supplied after API Mesh deployment

ADOBE_ASSETS_URL.label: Adobe Assets URL
ADOBE_ASSETS_URL.description: Optional URL for Adobe Experience Manager assets delivery
ADOBE_ASSETS_URL.helpText: Supply if the storefront should load assets from AEM.

ADOBE_CATALOG_API_KEY.label: Sandbox Catalog API Key
ADOBE_CATALOG_API_KEY.description: Your sandbox API key for Adobe Catalog Service
ADOBE_CATALOG_API_KEY.helpText: Key used by Catalog Service and Live Search sources in API Mesh.

ADOBE_CATALOG_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.label: Catalog Service Endpoint
ADOBE_CATALOG_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.description: Adobe Catalog Service GraphQL endpoint (shared with Live Search)
ADOBE_CATALOG_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.helpText: Public Adobe service endpoint for Catalog Service and Live Search

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Admin Password
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Password for Commerce admin panel access
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_PASSWORD.helpText: Admin user must have API access permissions.

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_USERNAME.label: Admin Username
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Username for Commerce admin panel access
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_USERNAME.helpText: Admin user must have API access permissions.

ADOBE_COMMERCE_CUSTOMER_GROUP.label: Customer Group ID
ADOBE_COMMERCE_CUSTOMER_GROUP.description: Defaults to the "Not Logged In" customer group
ADOBE_COMMERCE_CUSTOMER_GROUP.helpText: Leave as default for the "Not Logged In" customer group, or customize for specific pricing rules

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ENVIRONMENT_ID.label: Environment ID
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ENVIRONMENT_ID.description: Adobe Commerce Catalog Service dataspace identifier
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ENVIRONMENT_ID.helpText: Found in your Commerce Cloud project settings under Catalog Service configuration

ADOBE_COMMERCE_GRAPHQL_ENDPOINT.label: Commerce GraphQL Endpoint
ADOBE_COMMERCE_GRAPHQL_ENDPOINT.description: GraphQL endpoint of your Adobe Commerce instance
ADOBE_COMMERCE_GRAPHQL_ENDPOINT.helpText: This is the /graphql endpoint of your Commerce instance.

ADOBE_COMMERCE_STORE_VIEW_CODE.label: Store View Code
ADOBE_COMMERCE_STORE_VIEW_CODE.helpText: Typically 'default' unless you have a custom store view setup

ADOBE_COMMERCE_URL.label: Adobe Commerce URL
ADOBE_COMMERCE_URL.description: The base URL of your Adobe Commerce instance
ADOBE_COMMERCE_URL.helpText: Shared across mesh, storefront, and integration services

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.label: AWS Access Key ID
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key for S3 integration (optional)
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.helpText: Only needed if your integration uses AWS S3 for asset storage.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.label: AWS Secret Access Key
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret key for S3 integration (optional)
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.helpText: Pair this with your AWS Access Key ID for S3 access.

EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_API_KEY.label: Platform API Key
EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_API_KEY.description: API key for Adobe Experience Platform access
EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_API_KEY.helpText: Generate this in Adobe Developer Console for your Experience Platform project.

EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_DATASTREAM_ID.label: Datastream ID
EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_DATASTREAM_ID.helpText: Create a datastream in the Adobe Experience Platform Data Collection UI.
